text:
@WhiteHouse Depends on how u define winning ... Country w/MOST infected & DEATHS becuz of COVID19?  Last rpt less than 1% of Americans tested for Virus? I don't think we're winning ... AMERICANS ARE FIGHTING TO SURVIVE! 
#TrumpLiesAmericansDie
